main event: On September 7, 1968, multiple reliable witnesses observed a UFO in Aiken, South Carolina.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a fiery red to orange color, with some witnesses seeing it as round and others as oblong., The sighting lasted between 4 to 10 minutes., Witnesses included a housewife, a high school student, and a military supervisor., The weather conditions were clear with a full moon, providing good visibility., There were over thirty calls reported to the radar squadron about the sighting, showing significant public interest.
sighted object: UFO described as fiery red with multiple lights
witness description: Civilian witnesses with excellent character, including a housewife, a high school student, and military personnel.
